title: Can i get a PBE invite?
body: RIOT i sent a request to get on the PBE servers 2 years ago and i still have not got a invite. I just want to play with the new content you guys make but i cant get a invite

replies.body:
We can't manually review your PBE Application, but I can provide more info on how we select testers. First off, you aren't guaranteed a PBE invite simply by applying. The criteria we use to select testers changes all the time, depending on what we're testing in the PBE at the time. The most consistent bit of criteria is that we look for *really active players* that have a *positive impact* on the summoners around them. You can find out more on the PBE system in our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top), which I *highly recommend* checking out.

Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^
